posts.description: Meet The Maserati-Driving Deadhead Lawyer Who Stands Between Hackers And Prison
posts.extended: The law offices of Jay Leiderman occupy the third floor of a beige building in an unlovely office park across a busy road from a strip mall that features a martial arts studio, a discount tool mart, and a vape shop called “Vapes!” Here in Ventura, California — known variously as “Ventucky,
